attributes.additional_details: To make the process easier between Highways and local Council. Councils in Ancient areas need to set lower speeds. Mandatory
attributes.background: To make the process between Council and Highways easier. For Councils who know their towns to be able to have a greater say

rejection.details:
You could raise your issue with a local councillor who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:
https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
